name: Maraad's Dying Breath
description: Healing with Light of Dawn causes your next Light of the Martyr to also heal your Beacon of Light. Each ally healed by Light of Dawn increases Light of the Martyr healing by 10%.

name: Final Verdict
description: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals (194% of Attack power) Holy damage. Has a 50% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

name: Tempest of the Lightbringer
description:
Projects Divine Storm forward 20 yds, damaging all enemies in its path.

Also increases damage dealt by Divine Storm by 20%.

name: Relentless Inquisitor
description: Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

name: The Mad Paragon
description: Hammer of Wrath extends Avenging Wrath by 1 sec and deals 25% additional damage.

name: Uther's Devotion
description:
Your Blessing of Freedom

<condition>Blessing of Sacrifice</condition>
<dynamic> Blessing of Sacrifice</dynamic>

 and 

<condition>Blessing of Spellwarding</condition>
<dynamic>Blessing of Spellwarding</dynamic>

Blessing of Protection cooldowns are reduced by 1 sec per Holy Power spent.

name: Vanguard's Momentum
description: Hammer of Wrath has 2 extra charges, and increases the damage of your next Holy Power spender by 10%.

name: The Magistrate's Judgment
description: Judgment has a 60% chance to reduce the cost of your next Holy Power spender by 1.

name: From Dusk till Dawn
description:
When you reach 5 Holy Power, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you reach 0 Holy Power, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

<dynamic>Blessing of Dawn</dynamic>
<dynamic>Damage and healing increased by 6% for 10 sec.</dynamic>

<dynamic>Blessing of Dusk</dynamic>
<dynamic>Damage taken reduced by 6% for 10 sec.</dynamic>

name: Inflorescence of the Sunwell
description: Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge and its effects are increased by 20%.

name: Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun
description: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards, and all allies inside your Light of Dawn receive 20% increased healing from your spells for 6 sec.

name: Shock Barrier
description: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing up to (32 / 100 * Spell power) damage every 6 sec. Can protect up to 3 targets.

name: Holy Avenger's Engraved Sigil
description: Your Avenger's Shield has a 50% chance to have its cooldown instantly reset when used.

name: The Ardent Protector's Sanctum
description: Reduces damage taken while Ardent Defender is active by an additional 10%, and when you activate Ardent Defender, it will also apply to the nearest ally within 15 yards.

name: Bulwark of Righteous Fury
description: Each target hit by Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 30%.

name: Reign of Endless Kings
description: When you drop below 20% health, you become infused with Guardian of the Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
